channel.title: Comments on: The story behind Ian Curtis’ inevitable suicide

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: not sure. but i know he had a garage band called <a href="http://www.mailonsunday.co.uk/pages/live/articles/showbiz/bazbamigboye.html?in_page_id=1794&in_article_id=468091" rel="nofollow">10,000 Things</a>.
item.content:encoded: not sure. but i know he had a garage band called 10,000 Things.

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: Apparently, Corbijn has Hook smoking in the film - which I don't think he did. And unless I'm mistaken, didn't Sam Riley have a bit part in "24 Hour Party People?"
item.content:encoded: Apparently, Corbijn has Hook smoking in the film – which I don’t think he did. And unless I’m mistaken, didn’t Sam Riley have a bit part in “24 Hour Party People?”
